participant_1.background:
My laptop is my most valuable possession because it is a tool that I use every day to stay connected with friends and family, keep up with my hobbies, and do my job.
I cherish my memories with my pets.
i like to come up with new hairstyles.
i live on a boat.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.

participant_2.background:
I've got a laptop to help me keep track of my gardening plans.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.
I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.
I got injured while running and had to stop for a few weeks.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.

content.text: Good, thank you! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks. I'm excited to be meeting you!
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm really passionate about gardening.
That's great! I love gardening too. What kinds of plants do you like to grow?
I like to grow all kinds of plants, but I'm especially fond of tomatoes and peppers.
Me too! I love fresh tomatoes and peppers.
Do you have a lot of plants in your home?
Yes, I have a lot of plants in my home. I love having them around.
I love that! I have a lot of plants in my home too.
That's great! I love talking to people who are passionate about gardening.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
